sentences.en: Dave pulled a back muscle and could barely kick the ball.
sentences.cn: 戴夫背部拉伤，几乎没法踢球。

sentences.en: He could barely afford the railway fare.
sentences.cn: 他几乎买不起火车票。

sentences.en: He was barely able to drag his poisoned leg behind him.
sentences.cn: 他极费力地拖着那条中毒的腿走路。

sentences.en: I was barely existing.
sentences.cn: 我勉强维持生计。

sentences.en: It was 90 degrees and the air conditioning barely cooled the room.
sentences.cn: 当时气温达到了90度，空调也不能让房间凉快多少。

sentences.en: Joe and his brother are barely on speaking terms.
sentences.cn: 乔和他哥哥几乎不说话。

sentences.en: Mary had barely enough money to live on.
sentences.cn: 玛丽的钱只够勉强度日。

sentences.en: Mother was of very small stature, barely five feet tall.
sentences.cn: 母亲身材矮小，只有5英尺高。

sentences.en: Nowadays, the village has barely 100 inhabitants.
sentences.cn: 如今这个村庄只有100个居民。

sentences.en: She could barely understand English.
sentences.cn: 她勉强懂一点英语。

sentences.en: She was an elfin-like girl who looked barely 10 years old.
sentences.cn: 她是个鬼马小精灵，看起来也就刚满10岁。

sentences.en: She was barely aware of his presence.
sentences.cn: 她几乎没有注意到他的存在。

sentences.en: She was very old and barely able to walk.
sentences.cn: 她年纪非常大，只能勉强走几步路。

sentences.en: She'd lowered her voice until it was barely audible.
sentences.cn: 她把嗓音压低到几乎听不见。

sentences.en: Steve barely said a handful of words during the first half hour.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫在前半小时里没说几句话.

sentences.en: The Co-lonel's voice was barely audible.
sentences.cn: 上校微弱的声音几不可闻。

sentences.en: The letter was handwritten, in a hasty, barely decipherable scrawl.
sentences.cn: 这封信是仓促手写而成，潦草得几乎无法辨认。

sentences.en: There followed a barely audible burp.
sentences.cn: 接着是几乎听不见的打嗝声。

sentences.en: There was barely time for the two boys to escape unseen.
sentences.cn: 两个男孩想趁人不备偷偷溜走几乎是来不及的。

sentences.en: We're barely scraping by on my salary.
sentences.cn: 我们靠我的工资勉强度日。

sentences.en: With Betty's salary they barely made ends meet.
sentences.cn: 加上贝蒂的薪水，他们仅能勉强维持生计。
